pullRequest.title: Improved stability of Truffle debugger and implemented step from scripts to Java.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Stability of Truffle debugger is improved, especially the initialization when a polyglot Engine class is detected.
Stepping from Truffle scripts into Java code is implemented. This is important when e.g. JavaScript calls into java.
JPDAStep API is enhanced with filters, this is necessary for user-friendly step from scripts into Java.

commit.message: Improved stability of Truffle debugger and implemented step from scripts to Java.

nodes.bodyText: Fine evolution given there is just a single implementation of this type.
Updating the state only when the action is visible is good idea.
